publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7874 Shona Robison: The Public Services Reform (Scotland) Act 2010 (Consequential Modifications) Order 2011—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the Public Services Reform (Scotland) Act 2010 (Consequential Modifications) Order 2011 be approved. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*

S3M-7874 Shona Robison: The Public Services Reform (Scotland) Act 2010 (Consequential Modifications) Order 2011—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the Public Services Reform (Scotland) Act 2010 (Consequential Modifications) Order 2011 be approved. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon
